name: DreamLight (CodeLitter, iirlas, Lillium, labrattish, RagingSocksOfDoom)
description:
Repeat after me: Nothing can hurt me if I stay in the light.

The dark on the other hand?

Find the secrets hidden in the dark.  Seek solace in the light. And remember to conserve your mana.

Built on a limited palette, Dreamlight uses 3D Models to traverse a world in 2D perspective where enemies take on different visibility and behavior depending on the light.

INSTRUCTIONS:

A/D or Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Space x2 to double jump

Left Mouse Click or Shift to attack
